PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_TrackElementTypeSleeper
PropertySetDef.Definition: Properties common to the definition to all occurrences and types of IfcTrackElement with PredefinedType set to SLEEPER.

PropertyDef.Name: InstalledCondition
PropertyDef.Definition: Assessment of the condition of the element at point of installation.

PropertyDef.Name: TechnicalStandard
PropertyDef.Definition: The technical standard which the element should comply with.

PropertyDef.Name: FasteningType
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates the type of fastening used to generate traction between the foot of the rail and the sleeper. It depends on but is not uniquely identified by the type of sleeper. This property shall only be used when sleeper fastening is not modelled as an element.

PropertyDef.Name: IsElectricallyInsulated
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates whether the sleeper is electrically insulated due to its design or the running rails or not.

PropertyDef.Name: HollowSleeperUsage
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates the purpose of using hollow sleeper. The possible value can be eg. cable trenching, protection of turnout mechanism, etc.

PropertyDef.Name: NumberOfTrackCenters
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates the number of track centers running over the sleepers.

PropertyDef.Name: IsHollowSleeper
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates whether the sleeper is hollowed or not.
